description: Built to take the elements in stride, this jacket seals out moisture and cold, while keeping just the right amount of heat in. Plus, it features Columbia's Outgrown™ system of extendable cuffs, so it’s sure to be a favorite for seasons to come.
name: Nordic Strider Jacket - Youth Girls

specs.value: 100% Polyester, 150g Microtemp XF II 100% polyester, Legacy Dobby 72% Nylon, 28% Polyester
